entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near Haro Strait late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
